sentence: U.S. stock markets rose on Monday as more states prepared to lift coronavirus-induced curbs and investors geared up for the busiest week of quarterly earnings reports, including from tech titans Apple and Microsoft.

.N

At 11:39 ET, the Dow Jones Industrial Average .DJI was up 1.28% at 24,078.47.
The S&P 500 .SPX was up 1.36% at 2,875.44 and the Nasdaq Composite .IXIC was up 1.33% at 8,749.044.
